item.title: Lots of new stuff
item.description: The Quiqr project has been under the radar for quite a while. This will change soon as we have some exciting new things going on. Just to give a preview… we completely rewritten the GitHub sync functionality we’ve added new handy form fields, like a font picker and a font icon picker we have redesigned the Quiqr UI for a more smooth experience… Can’t wait. Download the latest Quiqr now!

item.title: Hugo Conf 2022
item.description: Quiqr went public at the Hugo Conf 2022. We want to thanks the people of the HugoConf for giving us time and space to promote our project. The slides of Pim’s Lightning Talk are available for reading back and you can download these slides as a Quiqr Template too.

item.title: Community
Download
item.description: Quiqr is available for Mac, Windows and Linux. Here are the latest installers. Quiqr for macOS Quiqr Desktop for macOS v0.17.11 Open the disk image and copy the Quiqr app to your Applications folder. Quiqr for Windows Quiqr Desktop for Windows v0.17.11 After download execute the .exe-file to install Quiqr. Quiqr for Linux Quiqr Desktop for Linux as AppImage v017.11 Older versions All earlier versions and binaries for other platforms are located on GitHub

item.title: hugoconf
item.description: Quiqr went public at the Hugo Conf 2022. We want to thanks the people of the HugoConf for giving us time and space to promote our project. The slides of Pim’s Lightning Talk are available for reading back and you can download these slides as a Quiqr Template too.

item.title: Screenshots
item.description: Quiqr looks like this… ready to use templates import Quiqr templates or Hugo Themes powerful CMS multiple sync targets, e.g. publish to GitHub Pages
